import React from 'react' import { NavLink, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { logoutUser } from '../actions/userActions' export default function Navbar() { const history = useHistory(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; const state = useSelector((state)=> state.handleCart); const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logoutUser()); history.push('/'); } return (
AK COLLECTION
  • Home
  • Producs
  • About
  • Contct
{userInfo ? (
Cart ({state.length})
) : (
Login Register Cart ({state.length})
)}
) }
